body:
We're going to be hosting some testing for the skywars maps this Saturday, 4-5pm EST. It will start at around 4-5pm EST and it will go for atleast an hour or two. As far as I'm aware it will probably be hosted on Beta. .

/server Beta

The maps we'll be playing are located on here (More maps will be made by then.) Looking forward to seeing some of you there.

- Map Developers


Please post your feedback for the event in this thread! If you have any suggestions for Sky Wars, we'll take them into consideration! As always, report bugs: we'll accept them in this thread or at avicus.net/issues.
